cards.back: The process by which plants convert light energy into chemical energy
cards.explanation: Photosynthesis occurs in chloroplasts and produces glucose and oxygen

cards.front: What is the powerhouse of the cell?
cards.explanation: Mitochondria produce ATP through cellular respiration
DNA carries genetic information in all living organisms

cards.front: What is the basic unit of life?
cards.explanation: All living organisms are composed of one or more cells

cards.back: The movement of water across a semipermeable membrane
cards.explanation: Water moves from areas of high concentration to low concentration

questions.question: Which organelle is responsible for protein synthesis?
What is the process of cell division called?
questions.explanation: Mitosis produces two identical daughter cells

questions.question: What gas do plants absorb from the atmosphere?
